description: Every journey is more fun with companions who are on the same wavelength as you! Share your travel ideas and get inspired by others.
subDescription: And if you find someone who matches your vibe, invite them for a trip together!
directionsText1: We don't sell tours or advertise anything.
directionsText2: People write about countries they want to visit and what to do there.
companionsText1: We are all unique, and everyone has their own idea of a perfect vacation.
companionsText2: One needs a beach and a cocktail, while another looks for a hiking route.
companionsExplanation: Now it's easy to find like-minded people!
registrationText1: Sign up, it's quick and free!
questions: Still have questions? We'd love to answer them!
